events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position submitted earlier today.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for a software developer role.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to assist you through the interview process for the engineering opportunity.
We completed the initial screening of your profile and credentials and are impressed with your background.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions and confirming your availability for next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 a.m., where our lead engineer will evaluate your skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview with strong problem-solving abilities and coding expertise demonstrated.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss culture fit, benefits, and next steps.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your interpersonal skills and alignment with our values.
An official job offer has been sent to you for the Software Engineer position including salary and benefits details.
We have received your positive feedback accepting the terms of the job offer and enthusiasm for joining our team.
You have formally accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and setup for your software developer role.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with your official start as a new software engineer in our company.
